comments.creator: mhbeasley@comcast.net
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13

Most of the time the tablet pen input panel icon shows when the Search or URL or an input field is selected. However, often it doesn't show. No pattern to this can be found, but this only happens with Firefox; Word, etc. work fine.

Reproducible: Sometimes

Most of the time the tablet pen input panel icon shows when the Search or URL or an input field is selected. However, often it doesn't show. No pattern to this can be found, but this only happens with Firefox; Word, etc. work fine.

Reproducible: Sometimes
